careers.title: Join Us
careers.description: Bringing intelligent, versatile robots into reality.

about.title: About Us
about.content:
Astribot was founded in Shenzhen in December 2022. As a leading AI robotics company, our vision is to empower billions of people with Al robotic partners, and our mission is to promote co-existence, co-creation and co-prosperity between humans and robots.

The company has pioneered a software-hardware integrated system architecture for AI (Design for AI, DFAI), deeply coupling 'AI capabilities' with 'optimal manipulation'. This innovation has led to key breakthroughs in embodied intelligence and data acquisition, enabling robots to learn, think, and work like humans while fostering smooth and intelligent interactions with people.

specs.title: Human-like abilities, Greater creativity
specs.description: Astribot S1 mirrors an adult male's operational parameters, delivering exceptional performance, stability, and safety - empowering researchers and explorers to bring imagination to life.

comparison.note: *This version is designed for scientific research, with select parameters unlockable for enhanced performance.

toolchain.description: Optimize onboard toolchains to create an open, efficient ecosystem - accelerating the development and validation of cutting-edge algorithms and models.
